about.title: About Me
about.description: Mechatronic engineer, Software lover based in Bolivia, specialized in web applications with React.js and Express.js. In my spare time I do sports, play video games and travel

n1.name: Consultora Blockchain
n1.description: I designed and developed mobile applications using React Native and Figma, consuming API Rest and aided by tools such as VSC, Postman and Gitlab. We worked in teams mentored by a technical leader. I came to design an application to do Trading, and to maintain and continuous development of an application for the dental school in my city

n2.name: Mentor CEI
n2.description: This was an education company, I was in charge of being the assistant to the technical manager in the company. This consisted of the maintenance of equipment and the code of the internal desktop application of the company that was done in Java

n3.title: Portfolio
n3.name: Image Search Engine
n3.description: Image search engine for viewing and downloading made with Bootswatch and React.js. Consume the Pixabay API.

n4.title: Portfolio
n4.name: Hospital Appointment
n4.description: This application can book appointments with doctors and nurses according to schedules that we ourselves can grant them. It does not present data persistence. This was made with Java SE.

thanks.goodbay: I will contact you as son as possible
